2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
Uncovered

Plots are made to manipulate a hermit novelist out of her hiding place. The chess boards set. But who are the players?
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: Uncovered

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
ENTER THE GARDEN

Tarn Gannigan was an exceptional college student who one day she received a mysterious invitation with an enigmatic crest at its center. The crest was a code that only a person with innate deductive abilities could decipher. In doing so, she learns of her possible participation into a long thought to be "urban Legend".

A secret society of sleuths known as "The Unsub Garden".
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: Enter the Garden

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
"BRUTALISTS," Part One

In the spirit of Bloodstrike’s groundbreaking carnage, the creator behind the indie hit Copra shines a light on Image’s most extreme series. Witness the origin of Cabbot as he launches his undead strikeforce upon the world!

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
A new world of flight prepares to take the Aspen Universe by storm!

In the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, Spain, a covert scientist discovers that possessing valuable data that could change the world comes with a dangerous price. However, it may be far too late for him to escape before the powers that be come to collect! Meanwhile, on the other side of the world, a loving suburban family makes a similar discovery, that the world is indeed much smaller than it seems, and no one is safe!

Don't miss the thrilling opening chapter to Aspen's newest action-adventure series from creator Frank Mastromauro (Shrugged, Overtaken), artist Marco Lorenzana and colorist Justice!

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
Jungle Fantasy returns with an all-new series focusing on the girls lurid, secret histories before they appeared in these pages! Sasha, with art by Di Amorim looks at how Kit's mom became Queen of the Lizard Men! The Vixens and Fauna were on a spaceship before they crashed, so now Ron Adrian gives us a sneak peak at that galactic life! And Christian Zanier graces the interiors with stories of Lorelei when she was feral and hunting the wilds on her own! All this and more!

Available with these sexy covers: Regular (and Nude and Adult), Lorelei (and Nude and Adult), Space Vixens (and Nude and Adult) by all by Christian Zanier - Wraparound (and Nude), Queen Sasha (and Adult) by Raulo Caceres - Sultry (and Nude), Luscious (and Nude) by Renato Camilo - Ivory (and Nude and Adult) by Matt Martin - Vixens (and Nude) by Ron Adrain -Century (limited to just 100) and Jungle Green Leather by Juan Jose Ryp - lastly, a Fifty Shades Nude by Camilo that is limited to just 50 copies!

A prequel issue of the all-new series that was New Zealand's top-selling indy comic for the last 10 years! The story set up the full series and gives readers insights into the unique relationship between a mutant triceratops and two little kids. Together they battle and befriend an octopus and a ghost, save a man and everyone in Freak Out City from a newly opened alien portal. It's just another day in the life of our detective hero, Blastosaurus!

Zero

When someone, or something, steals his stuff, Xander has to track them down to get it back. Unfortunately, that means going down into the sewers.

Don't miss the thrilling debut of Xander Fey, Monster Hunter!
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: Zero

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
Superpowers #0: Project Superpowers is Back! Written by Rob (Suicide Squad) Williams, illustrated by Sergio (Swords of Sorrow, Superman) Davila, and featuring an all-star roster of cover artists, this introductory priced issue is the perfect starting point for the most ambitious superhero story of 2018.

An all-new threat faces the Earth, while the team faces turmoil from within and must overcome all obstacles to prove their worth and value in a world that desperately needs its heroes. The Death Defying Devil, Samson, Black Terror, Masquerade, Green Lama, Scarab and more are all here as the adventure begins again.

Featuring an introductory story leading right into the all-new #1 next month, Project Superpowers #0 is action-packed and introductory priced. Includes bonus materials and 16 pages of original story.

Can you best the Thunderlock Barcrawl? It's not every day you find a tavern with a dungeon challenge built in its basement! It's up to your players to attempt this part proving ground, part extreme sporting event and get their names on the illustrious Wall of Crawlers. This zero issue of the all-new "Rolled & Told" includes a ready-to-play, fun adventure for Dungeons & Dragons 5th Ed. The free issue is packed with beautiful illustrations, comics coinciding with the adventure to excite and inspire your players, and helpful articles sure to enhance the game for new and old game masters alike.

A new age of mutant madness begins with the Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles! This special zero issue is your very first look at the new adventures the guys in green will be getting into this fall! Will the TMNT be able to master their new weapons, or will the weapons master them?!

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
The Fall of Pisces

Marcel and Wainwright are sent out to investigate a research spaceship gone missing at the edge of the star system, La Sillia.

Despite the beacon being recently sent to the C & G United Recon Union, the only semblance of life left on board the ship is a service droid. Will they discover the rest of the crew, or will they too mysteriously disappear?
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: The Fall of Pisces

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
A Collection of the Best of the 1990s JUPITER

Take a nostalgia trip through the critically acclaimed, poorly advertised, 1990s run of JUPITER! This curated collection brings you the best of the satire and Surrealism that filled Sandberg's classic, Indy black-and-white comic book.

Evan Dandy is a former pro wrestler turned talk show host who has transcended the wrestling business and has become a huge pop culture superstar. On the eve of his talk show's network premiere, Evan's integrity and former profession come under fire. Will Evan be able to control his temper or will he lash out and put his network deal in jeopardy? Find out in the premiere episode of Scout's new Binge imprint!

The Hunt

Many Moons in the future, a young hunter is tasked by his father to track an elk. Little did he know, there was another hunter on the trail.
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: The Hunt

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description: Salvation is story about Vahn, a 3/4 human and 1/4 demon, who has a mysterious curse mark that was given to him by his grandfather before he died. Now Vahn is on a journey to find the legendary shaman Solomon to finally rid himself of what has long plagued him..his curse mark. On his journey, Vahn is met with many obstacles as he faces off against dangerous enemies while in his search for peace and salvation.

Aspen's most ambitious epic series debuts with this introductory zero issue!

Introducing Remi, a young and energetic explorer and relic hunter, whose boundless curiosity leads to a startling discovery beyond anything she could have imagined!

Along with her alchemist father, Remi works in secret, away from the prying eyes of the ruling clerics who lord over the realms of her world with their ancient decrees and strict devotion. Remi has her own sense of dedication - Her heart to adventure and her mind to the truth. But, what happens when that truth could change the fate of her entire planet, and destroy the very fabric of her civilization?

An all-new Aspen Comics action-adventure epic debuts from the minds of creators Vince Hernandez (Michael Turner's Fathom: Kiani, Charismagic) and J.T. Krul (Michael Turner's Soulfire, Jirni) with breathtaking illustrations from newcomer Romina Moranelli! For Zihao, all his struggles and all his training has been leading up to this moment - a chance to upgrade his flesh and bone with the steel and circuitry of cybernetic enhancements in order to fight in the big arena. But, now that the moment of truth has arrived, he must decide once and for all if he's willing to the pay the ultimate price. There's no going back. Just ask Cassi.

Don't miss this exciting new chapter of an electrifying story in a bold new world! Aspen is proud to partner with ZMX Entertainment on their landmark project created by J.T. Krul, Yuyan Song, and Dinna Wu, and featuring the stellar creative team of Alex Konat, Mark Roslan, John Starr, and Sal Cipriano.

The Boy, the Uncle and the Lab.

With two chronic diseases, a primarily home schooled education, deceased parents no one knows anything about, a mysterious uncle who's always busy and one super genius friend, Theo Adams' life has been anything short of 'normal'. However, after Theo decides to pry into his uncle's private affairs, his world changes... LITERALLY.
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: The Boy, the Uncle and the Lab.

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
The Zero Chapter

The action packed debut of the all new cyberpunk fantasy saga, KNIGHT: The Wandering Stars begins here!

In a world known as "The Queen's Realm", Yas'min and Punch are young and highly skilled employees of The Queen's Knights Corporation. As Knights, their job is protect the Realm's infinite peace from Rogue Humanoids who seek to disturb it. As they battle and capture Rogues and earn payouts, they are also on the hunt for the mysterious being known as "The Black Scorpion", who took someone precious away from them.

For readers ages 12 and up.
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: The Zero Chapter

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
The ultimate celebration of the Doctor's many, many lives, a perfect beginner's guide and a brilliant tribute for long-term fans to enjoy! It's said that your life flashes before your eyes when you die: as the Doctor regenerates from his Twelfth incarnation to her Thirteenth, she relives memories from her many incarnations, showcasing unseen adventures from EVERY version of the Doctor!

If you don't know your TARDIS from your Sonic Screwdriver, this story is a wonderful introduction to Doctor Who. If you've seen every adventure so far, it's an amazing journey from the past into the future!

  • Marian Laclaustra drawing adventures for the Twelfth, First, and Seventh Doctors!
  • Giorgia Sposito drawing the Second, Fifth, Tenth, and Twelfth Doctors!
  • Arianna Florean drawing the Third and Sixth Doctors!
  • Brian Williamson drawing the Fourth Doctor!
  • Iolanda Zanfardino drawing the Eighth Doctor!
  • Neil Edwards drawing the War Doctor!
  • Pasquale Qualano drawing the Ninth and Eleventh Doctors!
  • Rachael Slott and Claudia Ianniciello drawing our first look at the Thirteenth Doctor!

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: The Many Lives of Doctor Who

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
SPIDERGEDDON IS HERE!

The end of all Spiders doesn't exclude the star of the most anticipated video game of 2018!

Marvel's Spider-Man is out September 7, 2018 exclusively on PlayStation 4. He makes his Marvel Comics debut on September 26!

How does he enter the Marvel Universe and what role will he play in the final chapter of SPIDER-VERSE?!

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
A Deed Without a Name

There’s a limit to the rate that you can believe in the miraculous…” What kind of world is it, when a day hunting demons in lonely valleys is normal? Especially if you’re hunting it with the avatar of the Archangel Michael? But today isn’t a normal day. And his time is running out.
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: A Deed Without A Name

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description: A pot smoking bum comes face to face with monsters that have infested the city he scavenges. Armed with a samurai sword given to him by a mysterious stranger who saves his life, he finds purpose to his otherwise meaningless existence.

Commander Adama and the remnants of humanity discover a second fugitive fleet, fleeing a different mortal enemy. Can the two armadas join forces, making common cause against the dreaded Cylons? And what would success mean for the quest for Earth? New York Times bestselling author and comics writer JOHN JACKSON MILLER (Star Wars, Star Trek, Halo) joins Dynamite for a miniseries timed for Battlestar Galactica’s 40th anniversary year!

Note: The indicia for this issue lists it as issue #1 instead of #0.

It's knights vs. zombies in this self-contained adventure!

It is rumored that William V, Lord of Montpellier, has no soul. The errant knight travels the Holy Land during the First Crusade in search of the succubus who stole his eternal spirit. Adventure is never far from William the Soulless!

Who Killed Kitty?

In case you missed it! We've got you covered with a re-release of the sold out FCBD issue now with an all-new exclusive cover and tons of bonus material! Following the shocking conclusion to Die Kitty Die: Hollywood or Bust, news of Kitty Ravencraft's unexpected and mysterious demise spreads throughout the Kitty-verse! Over at Kitty Comix, sneaky, opportunistic publisher Skip Stone is delighted to finally have the death of his main character that he always wanted to exploit! Meanwhile, Kitty's friends are suffering through the worst Free Comic Book Day ever without her. Just when they thought their Free Comic Book Day couldn't get any worse Kitty's ex-husband, Derek the Warlock arrives in search of answers!
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: Who Killed Kitty?

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
Reborn

After the confrontation with Doctor Neanderthal and The Gene Gnome in the Origin of the Species storyline (see the FFOTDM collection 2) Chip has been enjoying being human and living with his lover Bunny. Chip never had much luck before, and that hasn't changed. This #0 issue launches the new adventures of the Drunken Monkey!
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: Reborn

volume.name: Furious Fist of the Drunken Monkey

2018-06-01|2019-12-30.description:
Pandora is returning! As we prepare for new series with each of these lovely ladies, we couldn't resist re-mastering their original meeting from twenty years ago. But we got carried away, now it is an enormous 64 pages featuring a totally reworked, full-color epic with loads of smoking hot, all-new pages by Christian Zanier! To top it off, we added a Beautified version of every page with sexy new art!

An awesome array of covers includes: Regular (& Nude, Adult) + Wraparound (& Nude, Adult) + Killer Bodies ( & Nude, Adult) + Sultry Nude + Ripped Adult + Bold Adult + Erotic Adult + Sexy Nude, all by Christian Zanier - Stunners (& Nude) + Sirens (& Nude) by Renato Camilo - Luscious (& Nude, Adult) + Bloody Mary (& Nude, Adult) by Matt Martin - Deadly (& Nude, Adult) by Nahuel Lopez - and three of our legendary Fifty Shades Nude covers, limited to just 50 copies each: Al Rio Nude, Haunting Nude, and Battle Nude.

Introduction: Full of Prosperous Hope

The Outer Worlds is a Sci-Fi adventure about a small group of government hired bounty hunters in pursuit of super-powered criminals who have escaped the long arm of the law by fleeing the solar system.

Once they arrive in the "Outer Worlds" they discover that there are far more escapees than anticipated and that they have created their own colony.
2018-06-01|2019-12-30.name: Introduction: Full of Prosperous Hope
